fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Turn a player into an E-girl.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are an E-girl.
- Players who visit an E-girl become an E-girl
- If you win, the game ends.
- Players (besides the visit person you target) know that they are E-girls.
- You know all E-girls.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__
